## data type

* [integer](#integer) (whole numbers like 1L, -10L, 3000L)
* [double](#double) (numbers like -0.223, 10.324, 1e4)
* [string](#string)
* logical (`TRUE` or `FALSE`)

If you want to know what data type a variable is, use the function `typeof`.

```{r data-type-demo}
typeof(10)
typeof("10")
typeof(10L)
typeof(10 == 10)
```
